name: Bert Saves The Sun
description:
A top-down shooter/platformer made in 4 days as part of Quad Jam #3.

Your alien colony has stolen the suns from the solar system, making the sun angry. You play as Bert, who must stop the sun from turning into a mysterious looping supernova by going against your colony to retrieve all the planets and give them back to the sun.

All assets made by me other than:

Wall Tiles: https://morz4n.itch.io/8x8-sci-fi-tileset

Some SFX from Splice (which I then edited).

I hope you enjoy!
